meanings.definition: A thick woven fabric used as a floor covering.
meanings.sent1: The soft carpeting in the living room feels cozy under my feet.
meanings.sent2: We chose a blue carpeting for the bedroom to match the curtains.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy thought the carpeting was a giant chew toy.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a warm carpeting that enveloped everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious carpeting in the hotel lobby made guests feel like royalty.

meanings.definition: The act of covering a floor with carpet.
meanings.sent1: The carpeting of the entire office building took several days to complete.
meanings.sent2: After the carpeting, the room looked more inviting and comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The carpeting of the hallway was so well done that it seemed to float on air.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, carpeting the space with joy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The carpeting of the stage transformed it into a magical performance space.
